title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.7 - Oral arguments; briefs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.7 - Oral arguments; briefs

State Regulations

Oral argument in the matter shall be had at a time and
place fixed by the board. Reasonable notice thereof shall be given to the
parties and to such other persons as the board may determine. In the discretion
of the board, briefs may be submitted in accordance with such terms as it may
prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
70.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
